ai-tha-ap388:0.3_0: As he was the most senior monk, the fruits of the good,
ai-tha-ap388:1.1_0: Whoever came together and follows behind,
ai-tha-ap388:1.4_0: and they became able to get the fruit.
ai-tha-ap388:2.2_0: as it is from the wind.
ai-tha-ap388:2.4_0: I saw the fruits of the luck.
ai-tha-ap388:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap388:3.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
ai-tha-ap388:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap388:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap388:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap388:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap388:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vajirā.
